about_the_game:
Discover the universe of Highlands with the beautiful music of Simon Tardif, Simon Lacelle and Brent Gibbons.

Track listing:
1. A Storm is Brewing (Simon Tardif)
2. A Step into the Clouds (Brent Gibbons)
3. Pixie's Waltz (Simon Tardif)
4. Arislaan's Family Theme (Simon Tardif)
5. The Blistering Sun (Simon Lacelle)
6. A Balancing Act (Simon Tardif)
7. The Tick of the Clock (Simon Tardif)
8. No Worries (Simon Tardif)
9. The Enemy Within (Simon Lacelle)
10. Subtle Pressure (Simon Tardif)
11. History in the Making (Simon Tardif)
12. A Grave Decision (Simon Tardif)

Play Length: 30 minutes
